Class ViewFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.GenericView
      • view.ViewFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class ViewFacade
extends GenericView
implements IView, java.lang.Runnable, java.awt.event.KeyListener

    The Class ViewFacade provides a facade of the View component.
